title: Riot, you realize OP champs need nerfs, not small buffs, right?
body:
*cough*zedvayne*cough*

Or is it just that you guys really don't like fun?

replies.body: If you still think Zed is OP...man...you don't have a clue.

I'm sorry you like winning your lane with a champ that gets more AD than everyone else off items, free towerdives at 6, and has no mana, but that doesn't mean it's balanced and that doesn't mean you can insult someone who realizes that
